parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Tree View

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets color of the right picture on the tree view item defined by path

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[tvSetPictureRightColor]] [idc, path, color]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - path to tree view item

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> color: [[Color|Color (RGBA)]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value> control [[tvSetPictureRightColor]] [path, color]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [path, color]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - path to tree view item

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> color: [[Array]] in format [r,g,b,a]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[tvSetPictureRightColor]] [101, [0], [1,0,1,1]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[tvSetPictureRightColor]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[0], [1,0,1,1]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[tvAdd]], [[tvClear]], [[tvCollapse]], [[tvCount]], [[tvCurSel]], [[tvData]], [[tvDelete]], [[tvExpand]], [[tvPicture]], [[tvSetCurSel]], [[tvSetData]], [[tvSetValue]], [[tvSort]], [[tvSortByValue]], [[tvValue]], [[tvText]], [[tvSetText]], [[tvSetPicture]], [[tvSetPictureColor]], [[tvSetPictureRight]], [[tvSetPictureColor]], [[tvSetPictureColorSelected]], [[tvSetPictureColorDisabled]], [[tvSetPictureRightColorSelected]], [[tvSetPictureRightColorDisabled]]
</value></part></template>
